methods.name: sendEmail
methods.description: Send a text or HTML email to an arbitrary recipient.

params.description: The email address of the recipient.
params.name: recipient

params.description: The content type of the email. Can be text/plain or text/html
params.name: contentType

params.description: The body of the email. Must match the provided contentType parameter
params.name: body

methods.name: random
methods.description: Generates a random number. This is extra random because it had to travel half way around the world to be generated.

returns.description: A message containing a super duper random number
